content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I didn't reach an agreement with Mr. Wang. The last proposed price I was willing to accept was 1,250 euros per month, but Mr. Wang was still seeking a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I am not satisfied with the outcome, so I would rate it a 1, as I did not reach a mutually agreed upon price with the potential tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt
